channel.title: Emote Help
channel.description:
I made a command that when you do ::spec, red rings go around you, and you do an emote that makes you raise your weapon.
The problem comes in here, it only does the emote once, does any one know how to make it do the emote 4, or 5 times, ect.
thanks

item.title: Emote Help
item.dc:creator: @zane02 zane02
item.description:
@zane02 wrote:

      if (command.startsWith("spec) && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 12700) {
setAnimation(3926);
stillgfx(482, absY, absX);
}    
      else if (command.startsWith("spec") && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 12700) {
setAnimation(3926);
stillgfx(482, absY, absX);
lowGFX(246, 0);
}

or

       if (command.startsWith("spec) && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 12700) {
setAnimation(3926);
stillgfx(482, absY, absX);
}    
       else if (command.startsWith("spec") && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 12700) {
setAnimation(3926);
stillgfx(482, absY, absX);
stillgfx(492, absY, absX);
}

this may not work i just guessed, good luck with this.

Read full topic

item.title: Emote Help
item.dc:creator: @Gamerstips Gamerstips
item.description:
@Gamerstips wrote:

if (command.startsWith("spec) && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 12700) { setAnimation(3926); stillgfx(482, absY, absX); }

Read full topic
